my portfolio

my portfolio

Hi, I'm Dmytro Ilhanaiev. U can call me Dmytro as well as Dymytry, Dima, Dyma and so on. I appreciate u are checking out my humble corner. Actually, I'm actively and hard developing my portfolio, namely this place, this container for my works and strenuously working on my singles projects. I'm inspired by modern technologies and tools regarding web development really bad, its amazing stuff indeed. So, this place is going to be great ;)

While I am creating web applications ten times out of ten I use webpack, yarn and VS Code. These are the tools which are the cornerstone of my work. I like them: the yarn is fast and very comfortable tool, much better than npm, as for me; webpack - it's just an amazing bundler provides a lot of useful features and plugins. Now I can't imagine my life without autoprefixer, without opportunity to maintain browsers and versions you define, for instance :)

Most of all I like design ReactJS apps. Dynamic applications are my weakness at all. Going to join the fashion wave and try Vue.js

The source code of a couple of my works can be checked out onGitHub

Brno
Czech Republic
phone number:+420 776 042 607

Rocketmen React version


ReactJS application with Bootstrap4 styling. You can add new rocketman, sort the list of rocketmen by name, surname, date or superpower as well as edit rocketman's info or remove the one. Also you are able to search in the list

Subscribe form


Application includes forms validation just via javascript. Pure CSS styling, js+css animation and FontAwesome icons

JS app with adding and editing option


Application includes text-forms with javascript validation to add info and table with option to edit datas. Whole application was made just by javascript, no js frameworks. For styling were used Skeleton and FontAwesome

Node.js application - Chat


Localhost version. Using express and socket. io on the backend, requires SSL certificate for working online. In the resolving process. Using Pug as a view engine, jQuery for easy DOM manipulation, CSS framework Equalize.css and Animated.css

Game "Letters catcher"


JavaScript canvas game. Rules are inside. Meanwhile you are bored - try to catch all letters, don't let them fall!

Comments module via ReactJS


SPA React app. It adds and sorts comments. Using React + Babel and Bootstrap4 + React-Bootstrap + FontAwesome icons for sorting statements

Corporative webpage


Concept landing page for commercial firm. Including jQuery swiping, form validations via Html5 attributes. Also here is feature playing video by pure JavaScript excluding html5 API

Landing page for tattoo artist Daria


Using jQuery for photo gallery and animation, including CSS animation

Lite offer table


Lite style table using Bootstrap3 and @keyframes animation

First step with React


First attempt to work with React. SPA: dynamic content insertion

Website concept for media


Using Html5 to playing media files
